alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 8:19PM CDT until July 10 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... East central Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 819 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gibbon to 6 miles southeast of Kearney to near Axtell, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. At 811 PM CDT, an unofficial weather station in Kearney reported a 62 MPH gust in Kearney. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Gibbon around 825 PM CDT. Minden around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kenesaw, Heartwell and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 269 and 289. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
